task.title: Licensing the Plugin for DITA OT
task.shortdesc: This topic explains how to register the license for the plugin for the DITA Open Toolkit.

taskbody.context: To register the license for the plugin for the DITA Open Toolkit, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Open the [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/dita/DIT-OT/plugins/com.oxygenxml.webhelp directory and create a file called licensekey.txt.
In this file, copy your license key which you purchased for your plugin.
step.info: The WebHelp transformation process reads the license key from this file. In case the file does not exit, or it contains an invalid license, an error message will be displayed.
